name: Inside: A Magical Girl's Inner Challenge
name_original: Inside: A Magical Girl's Inner Challenge
description:
A magical girl must face her deepest enemy...
This game is a message for those that fight daily against depression or darker days. You're not alone, fight it, you'll win!

This endless runner is my first game ever made/published and it helped me learn a lot. I know it is simple as it is, since it was made for Magical Girl's jam with limited days, but it open ways for me to work hard and better in my future titles :)
